title: F/S - t206 HOF, So. Leaguer and Horizontal - PSA 3
author: Frazier

posts.post_title: F/S - t206 HOF, So. Leaguer and Horizontal - PSA 3
posts.post_content:
I have the following (3) different T206 singles for sale. All are graded PSA 3 VG condition. See scans for further details. Payment by Paypal F/F only to [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url]. Thanks for looking.

Joe Kelley - Piedmont 350 back - HOF - $135.00
Frank King - Piedmont 350 - So. Leaguer - $105.00
G. Mullin (Throwing) - Piedmont 150 - Horizontal pose - $80.00

Good luck with your collecting,

Bill
